definition: to split/to crack/to break open/to rend
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: General process of visbreaking is introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了减粘裂化工艺发展的一般过程。

sentences.english: The new visbreaking process with de-oiled asphalt feedstock is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了以脱油沥青为原料的减粘裂化新工艺。

sentences.english: Status quo of coking in domestic FCCU are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结了目前我国催化裂化装置的结焦情况。

sentences.english: Visbreaking technology is a mature thermal processing.
sentences.chinese: 减粘裂化是一种较为成熟的热加工工艺。

sentences.english: They have good heat transfer efficiency with better resistance to thermal cracking and chemical oxidation.
sentences.chinese: 具有良好的传热效率，更好地抵抗热裂化和化学氧化。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the application of re al time system of computer in FCC-process, .
sentences.chinese: 介绍了计算机实时监控系统在催化裂化过程中的应用。

sentences.english: The flue gas turbine- expander is the key equipment in catalytic cracking unit.
sentences.chinese: 烟气轮机是催化裂化装置的关键设备。

sentences.english: A new method establishing models of FCC main fractionator was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种新的催化裂化主分馏塔建模方法。

sentences.english: However, catalytic cracking of crude oil remains its largest application.
sentences.chinese: 不过石油催化裂化仍是其最大的用途。

sentences.english: It is known as catalytic cracking.
sentences.chinese: 这就是所谓的催化裂化。

sentences.english: Bottom heavy oil as the FCC or hydrocracking equipment materials.
sentences.chinese: 塔底重油作催化裂化或加氢裂扮装置的原料。

sentences.english: The most complex part of RFCC is in the feed injection zone.
sentences.chinese: 提升管的进料段是裂化反应最复杂的区域。

sentences.english: This work may form the basis of the investigation of lumped model for hydrocracking .
sentences.chinese: 为进一步研究和开发加氢裂化模型奠定了基础。

sentences.english: The postponable reduced viscosity process is a thermal cracking one of shallow degree of residual oil.
sentences.chinese: 延迟减粘是浅度热裂化渣油减粘工艺。

sentences.english: The use of exhaust paste before the catalytic converter can also cause the monolith to break .
sentences.chinese: 在催化裂化炉前使用废气浆糊也会引起塑胶制品破裂。

sentences.english: Then-heptane cracking reaction was selected as probe reaction to investigate the activity of studied samples.
sentences.chinese: 以正庚烷裂化反应为探针反应考察了样品的活性。

definition: fraction (of a distillate)/key (one component part of a distillate)
